Reviews.Content: returned 5 night stay dorado embassy suites enjoyed hotel reviews isnt 5star resort es provides value money service staff friendly efficient doesnt hesitate extra mile guests late checkout 8 pm flight couldnt nicer complaints include inconvenient parkingbut temporary situation caused construction garage casino oldschool tv sets suites havent seen tubestyle tv hotel time significantly breakfast complimentary extensive repetitious 5 days little variety nice insignificant compared lovely grounds pool beach wellmaintained evening cocktail hour overall friendly accommodating staff memorable experience location san juan quiet restful quick half hour trip citys amenities casino suspect people stay resort lot time renting car 65 cab fare airport makes car practically freebie

Reviews.Title: “Great value. Not a single complaint, look no further for a relax stay in PR close to San Juan”
Reviews.Author: JBFuentes
Reviews.Content: am offering review primary feel impressed quality service product received stay am 39 local san juan decided stay hotel time play golf dorado del mar club hotel offered service 2 nights stayed relaxing view atlantic ocean pools landscaping fountains invite stay outside hotel variety pools hidden gem value maids front service personnel service exceeded expectations interior hotel nice sitting fountains looking casino building street distance hotel maintain peaceful environment beach private inviting water tranquil sandy beach separated pool stone wall pool little bit beach sand seat enjoy view regarding dinning eat outside hotel enjoyed evening 1 12 2 hours daily free happy hour bar fine dinning offered hot breakfast buffet served omelet complimentary day eat pool evening serve formal dishes inside price reasonable economical restaurants outside time watching people enjoying dancing karaoke singing music professionally detail selling fine local jewelry delicious typical candies puerto rico weddings activities spacious mine standard suite bedroom living microwave sofa bed dinning table furnished tv sets beds cosy complimentary bottled water offer free tower service pool single complaint congratulate management staff nice representation tourist offer puerto rico inviting fine selected hotel lobby found corner tourism island celebrate birthday family friends april

Reviews.Content: returned 1 week stay embassy suites dorado puerto rico absolutely loved time wife 12 14 daughters found relax enoy weather pool ocean planning escape highly recommend hotel understand ritz carlton expect expect outstanding service found hotel friendly accomodating quick smile luis front desk pleasure talk lynette pool bar time recommendations regarding eating establishments beaches local attractions breakfast chef waiters bartenders valets extremely friendly found facilities clean pool nice beach maintained absolutely loved stay hesitate recommend hotel family friends location liked san juan hectic drawback lot choices restaurants minor drawback highly recommend rent car difficult san juan ferry 20 minutes hotel takes bay 50 cents person drops cruise ship docks makes easy san juan overall 2 thumbs
